item.title: What is MVC?
item.description: MVC! What is it? How’s it helpful? Tl;Dr D a t a b a s e M o d e l C S o e R n r o t v u r e t o r e l s l e r C l i e n t Model View Controller is an engineering design strategy popular in web development The client talks to the server, which talks to the Controller, which fetches data from a Model and puts it in a View.
